sections.heading: Definitions, where found.For purposes of the Nebraska Visitors Development Act, unless the context otherwise requires, the definitions found in sections 81-3704 to 81-3709
sections.text: 01 apply.SourceLaws 1980, LB 499, ยง 2;Laws 1988, LB 797, ยง 2;R.S.1943, (2008), ยง 81-1246;Laws 2012, LB1053, ยง 3;Laws 2015, LB449
